body: @redgon1998 *sigh* She.Wasn't.His.Girlfriend! They were JUST friends. Why should HE stop HER? Can't she fucking stop HERSELF? I like this conclusion. I love seto yuuki works😁. It's more realistic this way. When your first love not working, you have to move on in your life. Even if it is sad, you have to suck it up and keep believing its not the end of the world.

Most of you though Chitose love Hori caused she had reaction while having sex when she heard Hori sound but I think in different way.If we keep focusing from the start,Chitose have no one she liked but the instant situation draged her to have sex with that guy and ended up dating with him caused he had confested his love to her before Hori did. So I conclude in my own mind the reason why she had reaction to Hori sound caused both of man was loved her but the first guy just confest to her before and she didn't know how to deal this situation because she didn't love anyone from the beginning of the story.She just see Hori as her friend

Idk where ppl are saying hes going to continue this series. IDK isn't enough. it would be pointless to unless the Friend takes his new gf too. that would suck.

@hitormiss21 Chitose didn't fall for Taka's dick, though. That's just not Seto's style. Her reason for being with him is convenience and to save face(she doesn't want to think of herself as a slut). Why she doesn't leave him is just because she's a pushover that has no agency of her own. It's clear in this chapter she's in love with Hori...she just can't take the initiative to pursue him. Unlike Suzu. Something else you forgot. Hori has a new love interest and he doesn't care about Chitose anymore.
@kami nana what are you talking about seto yuuki has done NTR before

@gamelord She's no longer his crush. That was the whole point of that. He seen her for what she was and gave up. She's a lost cause. Why should he try for someone that doesn't love him enough to choose him over saving face...and she shows no sign of breaking up with Taka anytime soon. Hori's better without her. Suzu's much better and isn't afraid to go after him. He's first in her book.
@ss4chris There's more than one. Seto hasn't really gotten into NTR until recently.
A better ending frame would have been Suzu(new girl) hanging on Hori's arm. Would go in line with Kouhai pursuing her Sempai you see in most stories.

what ... what ... im a idiot expecting something from a hentai doujin

@SakuyaShirase expanding on a kiss part. I think it's a metaphorical "good bye kiss" that lets MC accept that it's over, which he was actively in denial off the whole Ch.4: he confesses to a girl that he let go off already (he doesn't ask her why, is not sad or angry, because he knows deep inside that he has no right to, after letting go); realistically speaking, he mush have heard them in the toilet, but it ;he then goes to her house, obviously fishing for contact, but refuses to enter her room, even though he knows what's happening, but he refuses to see, and finally accepts invitation to karaoke thinking he wants to see her again, even when he already knows he lost her. Super denial. But man, what a masterclass on (soft'ish) NTR. It hits just hard enough that I can see someone getting up from reading it, and immediately asking their crush out just in case, to not miss timing. At the same time, it doesn't leave the nasty, scaring aftertaste of harder stuff I look at to hurt myself ;)

@SamuyaShirase yes that is true she was drunk HOWEVER when she woke up after passing out, Mika gave her contraceptives, the chapter doesn’t show the guys explaining to Chitose what happened while she was drunk but it is safe to assume that they told her everything. If you pay attention, Chitose doesn’t even look ashamed at all after they left Karaoke. In chapter 1 Chitose was very ashamed after giving the gorilla a blowjob. In this chapter she seemed to not care if Hori had seen her getting fucked.  Sure she was drunk when she did all those things but the doesn’t even feel shame about it after she has sobered up.

honestly its MC's fault for not being honest with his feelings since middle school. If NTR teaches us something its that opportunity knocks only once

however if she felt the same sshe should have said something. she just saw a big dick since ch1 and all her feelings for the MC went out the window if she ever felt something for him in the first place. so-so ending. the MC has moved on.

@xvdyx Well, she was drunk when she did it, she even doesn't remember a single thing that happened. So it's hard to say if what she did is because of how she really is/feels. Also, Taka wasn't going to have sex with her when he realized he forgot the condoms but she said it was ok, which surprised Mika, giving the idea/implying that Chitose was not being her usual. Though I'm bad with Japanese so I've might misread things. 
@glad1985 I see your point, it's just it happened all of the sudden, without a monologue or something to explain better. Since it was the end maybe I expected a more direct conclusion.

I consider this both a good ending and a bad ending, although I’m leaning more toward the bad ending side. Good because the way it ended things was the most mature and realistic way to end it since you are forced to give up on lots of things in life. It’s a bad ending because it was very weak, the climax (the sex scene at karaoke) from this chapter felt very bland, it lacked punch which is what you would expect from the freaking ending of a series even if it’s small. Not only was it weak but it also left many things unclear about all the characters. The ending is supposed to answer questions not create more. AND to make things worse it did not give us a MIKA SEX SCENE WTF!!!
To be fair, if he just admitted that he liked chitose in chapter 1, we wouldn't be here. WELP this was bitter sweet af or maybe just bitter lol
A wholesome netorare? Well that's new

@SakuyaShirase I interpreted him feeling motivated to move on after getting a blowjob as him realizing that Chitose has been completely corrupted and is now way out of his reach. The Chitose he fell in love with was innocent, childish and cute but the one in front of him right now is a Chitose that will unhesitantly such another guy’s dick while having another dick being thrust into her at the same time. In the previous chapters it was mentioned that Chitose probably agreed tl date the Gorilla because she didn’t wanna be looked at as a slut who’d have sex with someone she isn’t dating but in this chapter we can see that Chitose no longer cares for such things and has already started losing shame. I do hope there is an extra chapter where we get a monologue from him that tells us what really motivated him to move on as well as a better constructed ending than this.
yep, terrible ending. He didn't even get to have sex with her, not even once. Hahaha.
huhm gotta wait for the translation but at least it's finally here.

Sometimes life just ends up differently than expected and there's nothing wrong with that. Most of the time your love would end up fruitless. At the end of the day we don't really know what chitose truly feels and could only assume from the MC's viewpoint. Was expecting some usual NTR stuff from seto yuuki with loser MC but ended up with a relatable and likeable MC and something good and oddly satisfying, This doujin gave me a 5 cm per second vibe. 10/10 good shit, story was great, ending as well.

First NTR i've read were the guy who NTRs the other turns out to be a good guy who actually cares for the MC, he probably would've gone after Chitose if he knew about Horis feelings. Kinda like this ending and at least the mc moved on.

Well, could have been worse the ending. Kinda disappointed Hori and Chitose didn't set their feelings straight, since in the previous chapter she stopped him but at the same time didn't exactly reject him. A bit salty we didn't get to see some more Mika and Hori action since after the karaoke she invited him to her place for some lust relief. Hori going to a new barber is probably a way to show he moved on since he doesn't go to Chitoses place anymore (How does getting a blowjob and kiss from her motivate you to move on??). Also, the new girl joined the club because of Hori. I still believe Taka is a good guy despite being drawn as a douch. He even is the reason Hori got a blowjob from Chitose, since he told her to do it and the only reason he was fine with is was "because its Hori". Im still hoping for some sort of After Story thing, because of the way the last page is worded.

at the end its their last year of high school and they got a new member for the art club and she straight confesses she's got an interest in mc also he's fucking the glasses bitch. not the "master piece" some were specting (why would you lol) but was ok could have had more glasses girl.
I was expecting better scenes than the ch.4 ones, my disappointment is immeasurable and my day is ruined
